name: Fractal Zoomer
description:
Zoom into many different fractals, like the Mandelbrot set, Julia set, Burning Ship, and some that I even made myself! You can change the color scheme, iteration count, zoom, and more. If you see an image you like, you can save it too.

To the right are some screenshots from the fractals I generated. I'm constantly updating the game, so if you have something you'd like me to add, I'd be happy to do it.
